Minz Won

minz.won@upf.edu
Currently in Seoul 🇰🇷

Research Scientist

I research machine learning to enhance listeners' music experience.
My research interest covers audio representation learning, natural language processing, and multimodal approaches.

A fan of Barça and Packers.
I collect vinyl records.
(Scroll down to check my collections ↓↓↓)

Feel free to contact me 🤗
